topic.title: Deploy zeronet on GAE for private proxy using?
topic.body:
Although I know Compute Engine can do it but the price is just too high,
Currently I run ZeroNet on my DO for 5$/month, recently I moved most of my things to GAE just because  things just smoother there.
I was wondering is there a way to deploy ZeroNet as an App to GAE or already someone done it but I can't find it on google :(

2_1PvAednzaMJiuMz1SD5wF3m3Hx7SK75zHv.body: If 15441 port is in use, atleast have tor connetion
